languages.text: "Дабы подняться в покои госпожи, необходимо воссоздать священную реликвию, окропленную кровью самой Леди Орселлио. Жезл управления {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духом{/g} подъемника — у меня есть одна из частей, а вторая была утеряна во время бунта. Но даже сия реликвия бесполезна, пока на подъемный механизм не подается питание".

traits.locale_text: "Дабы подняться в покои госпожи, необходимо воссоздать священную реликвию, окропленную кровью самой Леди Орселлио. Жезл управления {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духом{/g} подъемника — у меня есть одна из частей, а вторая была утеряня во время бунта. Но даже сия реликвия бесполезна, пока на подъемный механизм не подается питание".

languages.text: "In order to ascend to the mistress's chambers, you will need to remake a holy relic sanctified with the blood of Lady Orsellio herself. This is the control rod of the elevator {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}. I have one part and the other was lost during the mutiny. But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."
languages.original_text: "Дабы подняться в покои госпожи, необходимо воссоздать священную реликвию, окропленную кровью самой Леди Орселлио. Жезл управления {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духом{/g} подъемника — у меня есть одна из частей, а вторая была утеряна во время бунта. Но даже сия реликвия бесполезна, пока на подъемный механизм не подается питание".

traits.locale_text: "In order to ascend to the mistress's chambers you will need to remake a holy relic affused with the blood of Lady Orsellio herself. This is the elevator {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} control rod, I have one part and the other was lost during the mutiny. But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."

"In order to ascend to the mistress's chambers you will need to remake a holy relic affused with the blood of Lady Orsellio herself. This is the elevator {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} control rod, I have one part and the other was lost during the mutiny. But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."

But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."

"In order to ascend to the mistress's chambers, you will need to remake a holy relic sanctified with the blood of Lady Orsellio herself. This is the control rod of the elevator {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}. I have one part and the other was lost during the mutiny. But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."

languages.text: "Um zu den Kammern der Herrin zu gelangen, müsst Ihr ein heiliges Relikt wiederherstellen, das mit dem Blut von Lady Orsellio selbst gesegnet ist. Es geht um den Kontrollstab für den {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g} des Aufzugs. Ich habe einen Teil, der andere ging während der Meuterei verloren. Doch selbst dieses Relikt ist nutzlos, wenn der Aufzugmechanismus nicht mit Strom versorgt wird."
languages.original_text: "In order to ascend to the mistress's chambers, you will need to remake a holy relic sanctified with the blood of Lady Orsellio herself. This is the control rod of the elevator {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}. I have one part and the other was lost during the mutiny. But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."

traits.locale_text: "Um zu den Kammern der Herrin zu gelangen, müsst Ihr ein heiliges Relikt wiederherstellen, das mit dem Blut von Lady Orsellio selbst gesegnet ist. Es geht um den Kontrollstab für den {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g} des Aufzugs. Ich habe einen Teil, der andere ging während der Meuterei verloren. Doch selbst dieses Relikt ist nutzlos, wenn der Aufzugmechanismus nicht mit Strom versorgt wird."

languages.text: « Pour atteindre les quartiers de ma maîtresse, vous allez devoir recréer une relique sainte, consacrée avec le sang de dame Orsellio en personne. Voici la tige de contrôle de l'{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit de la machine{/g} lié à l'ascenseur ; j'en possède une partie, mais l'autre a été perdue durant la mutinerie. Cela dit, même cette relique ne vous sera d'aucune utilité si le mécanisme de l'ascenseur n'est pas alimenté. »
languages.original_text: "In order to ascend to the mistress's chambers, you will need to remake a holy relic sanctified with the blood of Lady Orsellio herself. This is the control rod of the elevator {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}. I have one part and the other was lost during the mutiny. But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."

traits.locale_text: « Pour atteindre les quartiers de ma maîtresse, vous allez devoir recréer une relique sainte, consacrée avec le sang de dame Orsellio en personne. Voici la tige de contrôle de l'{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit de la machine{/g} lié à l'ascenseur ; j'en possède une partie, mais l'autre a été perdue durant la mutinerie. Cela dit, même cette relique ne vous sera d'aucune utilité si le mécanisme de l'ascenseur n'est pas alimenté. »

languages.text: “若想前往女主人所在的房间，您需要重塑用奥赛罗女士的鲜血制成的圣物。这是电梯{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}的控制手杖，我只有这一部分，另一部分在叛乱中遗失了。不过，如果不先给电梯供电的话，就算有了那件圣物也没用。”
languages.original_text: "In order to ascend to the mistress's chambers, you will need to remake a holy relic sanctified with the blood of Lady Orsellio herself. This is the control rod of the elevator {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}. I have one part and the other was lost during the mutiny. But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."

traits.locale_text: “若想前往女主人所在的房间，您需要重塑用奥塞罗女士的鲜血制成的圣物。这是电梯{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}的控制手杖，我只有这一部分，另一部分在叛乱中遗失了。不过，如果不先给电梯供电的话，就算有了那件圣物也没用。”

languages.text: 「主の部屋まで上がるには、オーセリオ様その人の血で神聖化された聖遺物を作り直す必要がある。これはエレベーターの{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}の制御ロッドだ。一部は私の手元にあり、別の部分は暴動の中でどこかへいってしまった。しかし、この遺物もエレベーターのシステムに動力が供給されなければ使い物にならない」
languages.original_text: "In order to ascend to the mistress's chambers, you will need to remake a holy relic sanctified with the blood of Lady Orsellio herself. This is the control rod of the elevator {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}. I have one part and the other was lost during the mutiny. But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."

traits.locale_text: 「主の部屋まで上がるには、オーセリオ様その人の血で神聖化された聖遺物を作り直す必要がある。これはエレベーターの{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}の制御ロッドだ。一部は私の手元にあり、別の部分は暴動の中でどこかへいってしまった。しかし、この遺物もエレベーターのシステムに動力が供給されなければ使い物にならない」
「主の部屋まで上がるには、オーセリオ様その人の血で神聖化された聖遺物を作り直す必要がある。これはエレベーターの{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}の制御ロッドだ。一部は私の手元にあり、別の部分は暴動の中でどこかへいってしまった。しかし、この遺物もエレベーターのシステムに動力が供給されなければ使い物にならない」

languages.text: «Para ascender a las habitaciones de la señora, necesitará reformar una reliquia sagrada santificada con la sangre de la propia lady Orsellio. Se trata de la vara de control del {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} del ascensor. Yo tengo una parte, pero la otra se perdió durante el motín. Además de eso, la reliquia no servirá de nada mientras el mecanismo del ascensor no tenga energía».
languages.original_text: "In order to ascend to the mistress's chambers, you will need to remake a holy relic sanctified with the blood of Lady Orsellio herself. This is the control rod of the elevator {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}. I have one part and the other was lost during the mutiny. But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."

traits.locale_text: «Para ascender a las habitaciones de la señora, necesitará reformar una reliquia sagrada santificada con la sangre de la propia lady Orsellio. Se trata de la vara de control del {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} del ascensor. Yo tengo una parte, pero la otra se perdió durante el motín. Además de eso, la reliquia no servirá de nada mientras el mecanismo del ascensor no tenga energía».

languages.text: "Hanımın odasına çıkmak için bizzat Leydi Orsellio'nun kanıyla kutsanmış bir yadigârı, asansör {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhunun{/g} kontrol çubuğunu toplaman gerek. Bir parçası bende, diğeri isyanda kayboldu. Ancak asansör mekanizmasına güç gitmedikçe o yadigâr da bir işe yaramaz."
languages.original_text: "In order to ascend to the mistress's chambers, you will need to remake a holy relic sanctified with the blood of Lady Orsellio herself. This is the control rod of the elevator {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g}. I have one part and the other was lost during the mutiny. But even this relic will be of no use unless the elevator mechanism is powered."

traits.locale_text: "Hanımın odasına çıkmak için bizzat Leydi Orsellio'nun kanıyla kutsanmış bir yadigârı, asansör {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhu{/g}nun kontrol çubuğunu toplaman gerek. Bir parçası bende, diğeri isyanda kayboldu. Ancak asansör mekanizmasına güç gitmedikçe o yadigâr da bir işe yaramaz."
